title: Paint a Rumour
lyrics:
Paint a rumour
(What's it gonna spread?)
Paint a rumour
(See the place go red)
I could tell you something
(Promise not to tell)

I could tell you something

(Promise not to sell)



It's a secret



I have heard a whisper

I have heard a whisper

(What did it say?) 

I have heard a whisper

(Make it go away)

Don't beleive a word of it

(Promise not to tell)

Don't repeat a word of it

(Promise not to sell)
